entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
